Metadata: USER MANUAL FOR RECON: A GENERAL FISH-STOCK RECONSTRUCTION MODEL AT OREGON STATE UNIVERSITY

This guide documents the model RECON, a specific application of the STMCOH software package. Although not imperative, it is advisable that users of RECON have some familiarity with SZMCON or at least have access to the SMCON User's Guide (see References). KW: COMPUTER; MODEL; FISHERY.
